name: Discovery: The Horse Run
description:
Play as Discovery the horse and run as far as possible without colliding with the fences.
Help him get a place in the U.S. Racing Hall Of Fame.

Discovery (1931–1958) was a champion American Thoroughbred racehorse. One of the greatest horses of the 20th century, he was inducted into the U.S. Racing Hall of Fame in 1969.

Note << "Please press 'S' on the home screen to go to the settings, and user left and right keys to adjust jump force according to your frame rate." << endl;
